website_summaries.verdict: Technologically advanced trash can offers touch-free opening and closing.
pros: Brushed stainless steel is fingerprint- and smudge-proof
Touch-free, the motion of your hand opens the lid
cons: Between the batteries and the odor filter, there are items that need to be purchased separately and repeatedly

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPORTANT MISSING FEATURE
customer_reviews.text: It is imperative that if you buy this automatically opening trash can, you complete the product by adding two large googly eyes to the lid. At first you may be tempted to omit this 3rd-party accessory. Resist. Eyeless, lost in a sea of darkness and dank detritus, this otherwise well-made trash can will forever haunt your kitchen with the blind actuation of its sightless maw. Take it from me and my faithful friend: Do not thusly seal its fate. This fellow is dutiful and loving, eating all the trash you toss down its brushed aluminum gullet—so long as it is properly anthropomorphized. Until then, its soulless hunger knows no bounds.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stillinger

customer_reviews.title: Recommend AC Power Adapter
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! I highly recommend the AC Power Adapter if you have your trashcan near an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn't take a lot of room and the price was great
customer_reviews.author: John F Dongarra

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can actually holds more than the standard ones you get at Walmart or Target. Very well made & the open & close options are kinda fun!
customer_reviews.author: M. M. H.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, stores a lot of trash
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, stores a lot of trash. I'm currently using batteries we will see how long they last, I also purchased the plug as backup.
customer_reviews.author: Harleydude

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this product, bought it in July 2018, but it's been about six months and the lid no longer responds. It started to not open up all the way but would close fine, I figured it might need new batteries so I replaced them but it continued to struggle to open. It no longer functions, quite disappointing for it only being about 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Touchless lid STOPS WORKING!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for 2 months. In that TWO months the supposedly touch less lid has almost completely stopped working. We have changed the batteries numerous times trying to get this can to work properly as this was a replacement for a can that we had for over 3 YEARS. We replaced that can due to the life of the can as it was still working. THIS can is not working after TWO months.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this garbage can...just wish it did not open every time u are near ig
customer_reviews.author: lynnghms

customer_reviews.title: DISABLED PERSONS PRODUCTHANDS FREE OPERATION, IT IS AMAZING,  ALSO FOR ANYONE WHO HAS THIER HANDS FULL OF TRASH/GARBAGE LOL
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS AMMAZING ESPECIALLY FOR DISABLED PERSONS. I HAVE BEEN USING THEM EVER SENCE THEY STARTED MAKING THEM, AUTOMATICLY OPEN AND CLOSE BUT SENCE I BAUGHT THIS ONE, BUT I HOPE THAT THEY HAVE INCLUDED THE ELECTRIC POWER CORD WITH IT OTHERWISE, YOU MAY NEED TO BUY THE ELECTRICAL PLUG IN FOR IT, BUT IT ALSO RUNS ON BATTERIES ALSO LOL.
customer_reviews.author: FRANKLIN C.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient  and fun.
customer_reviews.text: This trash can exceeded my expectations. It has become a fun thing at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Eames

customer_reviews.title: YES to the best trashcans made!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an Amazon warehouse deal..had a small dent that was easily bumped out on the body. The construction of the can is terrific. The Sensor is working great and I'm so glad it's been made now a) with a MUCH longer hold open time, and b) with the nice air filter to keep the odors at bay in your trash. I'm very much a satisfied customer..I've owned iTouchless cans for YEARS and this one is the best made yet!
customer_reviews.author: catperson

customer_reviews.title: We actually love it. The only thing we are not thrilled ...
customer_reviews.text: We actually love it. The only thing we are not thrilled with is the fact that sometimes it opens when you walk by it. Other than that, it is so nice to not have to touch the can when you are throwing something out and your hands are not clean. Something that happens a lot in the kitchen when you are cooking or cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Lid sensor already messed up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Dec 2019, the lid sensor is already not functioning correctly. It’s not the batteries since I use the adapter. It opens up almost halfway & closes so I have to manually open it to throw out trash. I have tried unplugging & plugging it back in..still does not work properly. Please help me replace this asap.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Questionable motor for longevity
customer_reviews.text: Had it a few months now bought the power cable. Work perfect for the first month now the door open a lot slower not sure why, nice looking trash can hope it continues to work.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on day 1
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and put new batteries in it and it doesn’t work. Will be returning. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Steve from Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for family member. Trashcan doesn't work. Tried C batteries and then went out and bought new batteries just in case. Still not working. Sent back for replacement. I hope the next one works cause family member really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: RMT

customer_reviews.title: Garbage can broke 3 months into having it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't matter if there are brand new batteries in the garbage can or not, the thing does not work. I am very disappointed with this product. Now, they did offer to refund my money, so I bought another garbage can that was worse than this one. I sent the new one back and kept this garbage can took the top off since it was not working. If the manufacture offered to send a new top that would be fine, if not I guess I will have to deal with it temporary
customer_reviews.author: Richard Curtis

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and it looks like an expensive trash can.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one when my Ninestar one broke after a couple of years. This is very easy to assemble and the odor reducing filter helps with smelly garbage. It also has a faster reaction than my old can when I wave my hand above it. It cleans easily. The only drawback is the opening is a little smaller than our last one. So far, that has not been a problem but I can see it being a problem if we ever have something large to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne S FultonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for 2 and a 1/2 months then it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this trash can. It worked great for 2 and a 1/2 months then it stopped working. I thought the batteries were dead so replace that. It didn't fix the problem. Now it's a worthless trash can sitting in my kitchen that I paid $$$ for. Not happy! Save your money, I can't believe it broke after literally 2 and a half months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Like apparently many others, we had this for a couple months with no problems at all, and then the lid stopped working. Basically it will respond, but VERY slowly open only about 1/2 way. New batteries did not help. Pretty much a useless product now (purchased in late October - issues started in late January). Definitely would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Surdick

customer_reviews.title: Motions Sensor doesn't work Defeats the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product and bought the wall adapter for it as well. It looks nice. The top and at the bottom of the trashcan are two different shades or finish of Stainless Steel. I plugged it up. I press open and closed and those functions work but when I wave my hand or anything like that it doesn't work at all! I already threw away the box and everything expecting it to work. Now I feel like I'm stuck with it. I wish it worked because it fits perfectly where I need it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: BEST ITEM I HAVE EVER PURCHASED ON here Amazon.com !
customer_reviews.text: Love and I mean LOVE this trash Can ! Best item I have ever bought here on Amazon!!! Reasonably priced definitely spend the extra $ for the built in Filtration System You will never smell the trash even while it opens. The 1 thing I have A issue with is changing the filter You have to unscrew it which can be A tedious task but even worth having to do.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn McCallan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece of garbage in November 2019. Four months in it started to fail. I replaced the batteries three times and still nothing. I purchased the power pack hoping that would help...nope. It worked for about a day and then back to the same old stuff. I have tried to call customer service four times now and get the recording every time. Don’t waste your time with this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark's world

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We owned one of the itouchless trash can years ago and really liked it so when were looking again we decided to go with this one. We ordered it 5 months ago and it worked great. Recently the top stopped working properly. We thought it might be batteries and so we ordered a wall plug. When that didn't help I called the customer service number. They were extremely polite and helpful. They asked me a few questions had me turn it off and on and test it. Within minutes the representative told me that it was broken based on how it was responding and had a new top sent to me in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Love This Trash Can!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Lid doesn't close on you while you are emptying your plate into the can - it detects you are still there and stays open the whole time. My other can used to close on me all the time. This one is also very quiet when opening and closing. I purchased the AC adapter to go along with it only because I hate relying on batteries. Really happy with this purchase and recommend to anyone looking for a motion sensor trash can to try this one - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shevy

customer_reviews.title: 21st Century Convenience with Home Decor Beauty
customer_reviews.text: This is my third iTouchless Trash Can and I love them. So convenient not to have to open a lid, step on a lever or look at an open trash can. I even find myself waving my hand in front of my non-touchless trash cans! :) Plan on adding them to my bathrooms next.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Franssen

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after 11 months. I contact the seller and they responded with FAQ on how to fix it. I tried them and they didn't work. I also sent them a video. To date and 4 emails later they are not responding.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it has good design and it's as ...
customer_reviews.text: I found it when I was going to change my old trash can. this time I got this sensor one to update the old one. I like it, it has good design and it's as big as I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it's 50/50
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my simplehuman trash can died on me. I figured I'd give a different brand with a lower price point a try. It didn't work. Perhaps I received a faulty item, but both the batteries and using the plug in method failed miserably. I went through the entire troubleshoot process and ended up sending it back. It wasn't worth the fuss.
customer_reviews.author: LadyGlitterSparkles

customer_reviews.title: All around nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly in excellent condition. Nice shape for against a wall. Really fills 13 gallon bags. Motion sensor works excellent. Does not open inadvertantly when you are doing other tasks near the can. Nice match to my frig and dishwater. Has ability to add optional dc power supply. So far this week we open it about 25 times per day. Only thing I'd like to see are some finger holds on the cover to grasp for removal. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Barczak

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We had a different brand than this before with a much smaller opening, the bigger opening makes a huge difference, the filter is nice too,we're pleased!
customer_reviews.author: steven lupinski

customer_reviews.title: Love this can
customer_reviews.text: I love this can. I haven’t even hooked it up to a power source yet for the motion sensor (because lazy) and it opens and soft closes so well I’m actually loving it even without that. Other things I love about it: the extra ring that holds the garbage bag in place—life changing. Also the deodorizer, which is really effective (I was skeptical).
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are behind a screwed on cover; No chance of batteries falling out into the can's content.
customer_reviews.text: I like the smoothness that the door opens; The sensor seems super sensitive, which is good - no waving and waiting. Putting the batteries behind a screwed on cover is great. No chance of batteries falling into a can filled with garbage. There is no rushing to beat the door from closing before you finish depositing the items in the can.
customer_reviews.author: brassee

customer_reviews.title: Nice style, finger print free finish, works great!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this trash can, the odor filter is a nice bonus. Compared to our old touchless trashcan the batteries last way longer! Nice quality build and finish. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Buggy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This trashcan is used by my disabled mother who has to wear adult diapers. Let's just say that she is capable of filling those depends with a smell that could annihilate a small country. This trash can keeps those smells inside the bin and because it is stainless, does not keep that god-awful smell within its being. So needless to say, I highly recommend this trash can for the not so stinky, but DEFINITELY for the house-clearing, kind of messes.
customer_reviews.author: Dacey H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first automated trash can and it has worked every single time I wave my hand over the sensor. The batteries have lasted over 3 months, so far. The sensor is very responsive, in fact, I would say its a little too sensitive. I'd rather have it this way rather than not working consistently. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Y.

customer_reviews.title: great trash can
customer_reviews.text: I love this touchless trashcan to keep my hands free when I throw things away. the filter for smells works great as well at concealing nasty trash smells!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality all around
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! Already had the seller replace the lid once and despite using it as per directions and replacing batteries frequently the lid does not operate properly - have asked seller for refund and they have not responded- also it is definitely not quality stainless steel because despite cleaning outside with mild cleaner there are rust spots all over the can- do not buy - waste of money - usually spending more means you get better quality but not true in this case
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Lid works great with motion and item is good size. With straight back fits against wall nicely. Using batteries gets you off the grid. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E J

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how nice it is to have motion detection. When my hands are full it makes it so convenient. Nice size, not too small nor too big for the space I have.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. This is a nice kitchen trash can and we are really happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeD.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine. I bought this for my dad who lives for automatic garbage cans. He hasn’t had a complaint yet; so 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effecient
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can. I had a self-opening one before that stopped working. This is a little spendy, but I think worth it. Runs on batteries, or adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannene London

customer_reviews.title: Lid not opening properly
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift and already the lid won't open all of the way. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Southern WV customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but barely functional
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing these 4 months ago, the lids consistently do not respond properly to motion. I have to stand over them and wave my hand repeatedly for it to open. This has persisted even after putting in fresh batteries. I purchased 2 and they both behave this, so I do not think this is because I just received a faulty item
customer_reviews.author: Shontay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great...love it! The top is plastic though. But it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Angel B Houston

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged but Overall worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Trashcan has good sensor. It did arrived damaged but my boyfriend fixed it. Got it on sale so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bessie

customer_reviews.title: Motionless trash can.
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can. Easy to assemble, easy to clean. Just the right size for kitchen. It spoiled me.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia R. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic and so easy to setup and use!
customer_reviews.text: I like every feature included with this product. It's large enough and fits write where I wanted it to in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: isn't worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It has a mind of its own, opening and closing when not needed...and when needed the lid will NOT open all the way. was good for like the first 3 days...after that, pretty much a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: This comes without batteries first of all, then it never worked properly so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Rodgers 4 Prez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: After a month the bottom of the can had stretched out so much that it’s almost impossible to fit the lid on it. The motion sensor barely works and when it does the lid doesn’t open all the way, even with brand new batteries. The “open” button no longer works either. Not worth the price. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Touchless really works
customer_reviews.text: I use this trash can as my kitchen trash. It works very well, and I only have to take it out to the rubbish bin once every 3 days. The motion detection is fine, but I have to wait a little longer than is necessary for it to open up.
customer_reviews.author: Denese Morris

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this product. The trashcan showed up in perfect shape... except the lid doesn't open. The sensor lights come on, but nothing happens. We spent time on the phone with the company and they were no help.
customer_reviews.author: Jereme

customer_reviews.title: No power adapter or batteries included!
customer_reviews.text: No batteries, no power adapter...need to buy them seperatly...what crap. They could have lease told me the item was non functional until i spent more money. One would think for 60 bucks the trash can would work.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: The iTouchless is good so far but it does not come with batteries
customer_reviews.text: The iTouchless is good so far but it does not come with batteries. Therefore, when you order it, make sure you already have the batteries (C+) so you can try the machine as soon as you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. JAC

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this motion sensor trash can. It makes something I use everyday even more simple to use. I just hope it continues to work as well as it currently does.
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Who loves trash cans? Well, now I do! This one is amazing. Doesn't take up much space, looks nice with the stainless steal, and works perfectly, keeping messy hands from messing up the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!! My kids told me they like throwing trash away now and I love the size and no touch feature!! I never thought I would love a trash can but this one has changed that!!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Love this trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this trash can for about 2 years and I've had no issues with it at all. My entire family loves it. My dad loves it so much, that I got him one for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Moye

customer_reviews.title: Efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I am a clean freak and retired nurse. It is great not having to touch the can. It is a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: diana payne

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to work for long. Even with new batteries, the lid will not open after only about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Elke Leahigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice motion detection!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice trashcan! I like the wide mouth opening. The charcoal filter helps with odor control. I had a older version and liked it, so I wanted to stick with iTouchless with my new can.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: There were other negative reviews about this garbage can, but so far so good for me.(fingers crossed) I love the fact that you can turn it off and on and it works perfectly. The garbage bags fit well and they don't slip down!
customer_reviews.author: Leggs_82

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a Christmas gift last year. Still works great and cleans up nicely My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike c.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 2 months. Our old can lasted 7 years. DO NOT BUY !!
customer_reviews.author: TimD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this... extremely easy to use. Don't what I did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best garbage can we’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Lid stays open a good length of rime so it doesn’t drop on you easily. Great opening width.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: Defect passed onto a consumer
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! The quality of this product was not tested properly for it's functionality. You place the batteries in as directed in the instructions and nothing happens! The trouble shooting guide was followed and still did not work. So the next step is to return and share my experience with the a defect produced passed onto to a consumer. Hmmm, this was in the high range in terms of cost. Be cautious of the saying "You get what you pay for"...
customer_reviews.author: EASY O

customer_reviews.title: Works good at first
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July it stopped working so I changed the batteries still wont work. Very discouraging
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: Love this trashcan. Makes it so much easier when ive got my hands full or trying to scrape something messy into the trashcan. The only annoying thing about it is that I don't have a whole lot of space in my kitchen so it's a well trafficked area so the trashcan constantly opens and closes as you walk by it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Touchless trash bin is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bin! It looks and functions great. It’s awesome at keeping the nasty trash smell contained.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Looks nice and shape fits well in walkway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. I love the wide opening as well
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I love the wide opening as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorre B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple thing that make life a little easier, If its in your budget than buy one, I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas a armento

customer_reviews.title: iTouchless 13 Gallon Semi-Round  Trash Can HX
customer_reviews.text: Since having this electric trash can, we are quite happy with it. It holds the trash in place until you are ready to remove and replace it with a new trash bag so it doesn't fall during the time it is in the trash can. You do not have to touch the trash can at all so you can use both hands to dump the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Gitter

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product, is very good and light... ;) and the price was perfect! the right price for the just money.
customer_reviews.author: Arddys

customer_reviews.title: Already had to return top in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Contacted manufacturer and they had me email a receipt before telling me what they would do about the fact that it stopped opening. Then I get an email authorization to return it as long as I pay to ship it to them and give them a check as well for $20 so they can ship me a new top. $40 is better than $120 and so far the new one works as well as the first did when I first got it. We will see how long this one lasts. Be warned if you purchase this and have a problem, you will pay for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are not a viable option
customer_reviews.text: Even with fresh, good batteries, the lid only works for a day. The power cord is really a requirement, which is probably why it costs about $20. The manufacturer should just be honest and include the power cord in the cost of the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Freeman

customer_reviews.title: It worked great, until it didn't...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for like 6 months then the lid no longer stayed up for more than a second (even with new batteries). I emailed seller and will update you based on their response.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeMem

customer_reviews.title: It’s just not that good won’t open sometimes power cord won’t stay plugged in ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s just not that good won’t open sometimes power cord won’t stay plugged in half the time... just disappointed
customer_reviews.author: henry martin

customer_reviews.title: I've had other models that lasted for years. However ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had other models that lasted for years. However, I got two of these recently in a row where the lid would not stay open for more than a split second then close. I returned both.
customer_reviews.author: lottp

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sensor did not work, i have to press the open and close button every time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Can’t use it
customer_reviews.text: I received the package yesterday, it didnt have a nice package brand box. I can’t believe it also not come with adapter, and you have to buy separately! This item shows on sale, but I didn’t save that much money, because I have to pay extra $$$money for adaptor. Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: yao ding

customer_reviews.title: Trashy Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 1 star because it came in not looking like the picture at all, and the sensor for you to wave your hand over isn't the greatest. It takes several times of me waving my hand in order to to get it to open, if it does. Now after only have this trashcan 6 months the battery holder for this trashcan broke, this thing is useless without that.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: ... with just a wave of my hand sure is nice. The lid closes tight and keeps kitchen waste ...
customer_reviews.text: Right size for a small space and the ease of opening the lid with just a wave of my hand sure is nice. The lid closes tight and keeps kitchen waste smell out of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Baba

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this trash can. Easy to operate, great size -- would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kellie Unke

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying Our High Tech Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: After going through multiple trash cans and have the foot lever break almost immediately, we were ready to try something different. After seeing trash cans like for over a $100, we decided to give this one a try. We've been using it for a little over a week and have zero issues. I love that it has a band to hold the bags in place. I can't speak to battery life since we just got it but so far we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vampyrkizz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. The lid will open, but will not close, either automatically, OR manually. The little kotor just makes a sound, but it doesn’t move.... very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Fred B.

customer_reviews.title: Motor war out too quickly for product expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and price was not bad. But, after less than 16 months of use the motor is completely shot and I’ve felt as though I was cheated on this product! Will not open more than an inch with brand new batteries at this point. Not worth the money! Would just buy one you step on if you are looking for a touchless sort of experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is the the best value for the money. It works perfect, it's a great size and top is wide enough for every day use. Big plus is a plug in option - saves you money on replacing batteries. Amazon, as always, has the best price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ercan

customer_reviews.title: Several months later...
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for several months now. The original batteries are still good, the lid opens and closes as it did on day one. It's been helpful to have the motion sensor on several occasions. I really like the thin 'ring' that goes around the trash bag that keeps the bag from sinking inside the can - great detail.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: This is what arrived. Doesn't look like photo. This is square & taller so will be awkward to use in area attended. Heavy/sturdy but no wheels included so going to be hard to maneuver. Mot happy at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Westall1

customer_reviews.title: Great Wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: Love this wastebasket. It opens easily when waving your hand over it but isn't too sensitive where it opens as you walk by. It also stays open for a good amount of time. It's just the right size and it is easy to place a new 13 gallon trash bag around the ring insert so it doesn't show from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 11 months and it only worked for 1/2 of that. This company will not honor the warranty because you'll never be able to contact them. I have tried calling and emailing for a replacement and nothing. A warranty means squat if you can't get in touch with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird 78

customer_reviews.title: Be aware this does not include power supply
customer_reviews.text: So.... This needs power to operate, obviously. Therefore it makes absolutely no sense that it does not come with a power supply. The power supply is an "optional" separate purchase. Paying an additional $18 for the power supply makes this a not as awesome deal. Super disappointed, this Discovery made me feel I had been duped.
customer_reviews.author: A. Weller

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, like having an extra person standing there to open the lid when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my kitchen for trash. I've had these for years. I love the automatic lids when my hands are full of garbage to be thrown away. I just carry it over in both hands, wave over the sensor, throw what I have away.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor does not work.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work! The lid does not open and close via motion sensor. It only opens manually. I put in brand new batteries. The whole point of buying this was for the " touch-free" feature. Very disappointed 😞.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Clean trash can.
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash bin. Opens on its own. My friends all got one after I purchased mine. My daughter's all think it's pretty cool. Imagine you have gone on your hands and you don't want to get it on the top of your trash can. So just wave your hand over it and vuala.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Can!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can. Plenty of room! Easy to use! Good quality for the price. I would recommend buying the AC Power Adapter as well! That way you do not have to worry about changing the batteries!
customer_reviews.author: EllenD74

product_meta.title: iTouchless 13 Gallon Sensor Kitchen Trash Can with Odor Control System, Stainless Steel Semi-Round Extra-Wide Opening Touchless Automatic Garbage Bin
product_meta.description: Color:Brushed Stainless Steel Trash Can, 13 Gal SensorThis HX Model 13 Gallon Touchless Trashcan is a semi-round sensor operated trash can with extra wide (12.5 inches) opening for larger debris. As your hand or debris enter the zone 6 inches from the infrared sensor on top of the trash can, the lid will automatically open. The lid will remain open if debris or hand is within the 6 inches range of the infrared sensor. 3 seconds after your hand moves away from the lid it closes automatically. At the top front of the lid there are open and close buttons for manual operation, and there is a on/off power switch at the back of the trash can. This HX Model is redesigned with stronger lid hinge mechanism, air-escape holes for effortless trash bag removal, and carrying handle for easy mobility. Fits any regular 13 or 18 gallon trash bag. Comes with bag retainer ring to secure and hide the trash bag inside the trash can.
feature_bullets: UNCONDITIONAL PROMISE – Your 100 percentage satisfaction is assured and backed by a Full-Service Manufacturer's Promise for two years, including Dedicated Customer Support (see user manual for details)
CONVENIENT & HYGIENIC - Completely touch-free! Just the motion of your hand opens the lid, Reduce exposure to illness-causing bacteria – enjoy a healthier home
STOPS TRASH ODORS – 1 AbsorbX Natural Carbon Odor Filter is included to absorb and neutralize trash odors, for a fresh and clean smelling home
PERFECT KITCHEN TRASH CAN - Large 13 Gallon capacity in a space-saving semi-round shape, tet it holds a lot of trash! It’s perfect for busy family kitchens or offices

ELEGANT & MODERN – Stainless Steel can body is fingerprint-proof, smudge-resistant, and easy to clean. High-quality ABS plastic lid is durable, yet lightweight, It has a modern, stylish design that looks great in the kitchen or office

ELEGANT & MODERN – Stainless Steel can body is fingerprint-proof, smudge-resistant, and easy to clean. High-quality ABS plastic lid is durable, yet lightweight, It has a modern, stylish design that looks great in the kitchen or office
